SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_icon AS icon, m.menu_name AS NAME, m.menu_level AS menuLevel, m.menu_url AS path, m.menu_path AS component, m.menu_title AS title, m.keep_alive AS noCache FROM sys_menu m
LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.`role_id` = ur.`role_id` LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id`
WHERE m.delete_flag = 0 AND m.is_show = 1
AND ur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND r.`delete_flag` = 0
ORDER BY m.menu_sort ASC
